text: Now, as Alastair reduced the thrust, the pitch changed as the nose of the aircraft dipped slightly. The needle of the speed recorder swung gently through 8.0, 7.0, 6.0 in on minimum engine power." Geoffrey smiled. Alastair talked of running in when they were still more than four hundred miles from their destination..
